class shared storage capability that's managed through B center and then we're
backing it with AWS EBS storage so this is pretty awesome right because it gives

right so this allows us to create very cost-effective storage solutions it

back but once the once the disaster is over Site Recovery Manager also gives you the ability to do non-disruptive

the only way that you can be assured that it's going to work is if you test it but you don't want to have that

host cluster elastic DRS another feature of the service will kick in and will automatically add additional hosts into
